description: Aviv Growth Partners specializes in investing in Israeli founders and accelerating their commercialization in the U.S. market. They offer early-stage investment through 'AGP Ventures' and provide later-stage Israeli founders with U.S. go-to-market services via 'AGP Access'. Leveraging relationships with hundreds of U.S. corporations, AGP aims to provide Israeli founders with significant operational and commercial advantages. They also run a private WhatsApp group for Israeli founders to share opportunities and host a livestream series featuring executives from major corporations.
